thread.title: BRIEF-Smart & Final Stores, Inc. Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.15

title: BRIEF-Smart & Final Stores, Inc. Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.15
text: Smart & Final Stores, Inc. Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.15   Smart & Final Stores Inc: * SMART & FINAL STORES, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.15 * Q4 SALES $1.068 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.06 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $2.03 * SEES ‍FY 2018 NET SALES GROWTH 4.0% - 5.0%​ * SEES ‍FY 2018 COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH 1.0% - 2.0%​ * SEES FY ‍2018 ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS $0.42 - $0.47​ * SEES ‍FY 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES (NET) $80 MILLION - $90 MILLION​
